snippet: The rush is on for a new breed of marijuana capitalist in New York. How even a profitable company can run out of cash. Binding referendums in several red states Tuesday would raise the state minimum wage above the $7.25 an hour mandated by the...
abstract: The rush is on for a new breed of marijuana capitalist in New York. How even a profitable company can run out of cash. Binding referendums in several red states Tuesday would raise the state minimum wage above the $7.25 an hour mandated by the federal government.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: 'The Yelp of Business Software'
